item.description:
Hello fellow Boston Volunteers,

 

With Thanksgiving around the corner, before we start our celebrations, let's take a moment to think about the upcoming winter months for those less fortunate than we are.

 

Boston Volunteers is having a donation drive to support Rosie's place and Cradles to Crayons.

 

Rosie's place is a sanctuary for poor and homeless women, and provides a safe place, emergency and long term assistance to women who have nowhere to turn.

http://www.rosiesplace.org/

For Rosie's place we will be collecting women's winter clothing, especially coats, gloves, mittens, scarves and women's unopened toiletries.

 

Cradles to Crayons provides clothes and supplies to children upto the age of 12 living in poor and underprivileged conditions. They are currently significantly backed up in their orders.

http://cradlestocrayons.org/

Here is a list of most needed items

Most Needed Items:

  • Boys coats size 10-12
  • Boys clothing size 5/6-18/20
  • Girls clothing size 5/6
  • Boys gloves for ages 5-7
  • Baby board books

 

So let's go folks, let's clean out our closets, check in with friends, neighbours and families and bring our donations (women's and children's items) to Trident this Monday 11/19/12 and get together for some conversation and hot chocolate and the famous Trident pancakes.

 

Please check out the new updated website for our popular nonprofit.

www.BostonVolunteer.org (Thank you Usha for this labor of love)

Learn more about your fellow Boston Volunteers:

P.S. Please friend Paulette:http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Winter Donation Drive for Cradles to Crayons and Rosie's Place
